tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE content_calendar (
    post_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    post_title VARCHAR(255),
    post_content TEXT,
    platform VARCHAR(50),
    schedule_time TIMESTAMP
)
CREATE TABLE content_calendar (id INT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(255), content TEXT, schedule_date DATE, social_media_platform VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE social_media_platforms (id INT PRIMARY KEY, platform_name VARCHAR(50), followers INT, account_manager VARCHAR(100));
CREATE TABLE posts (id INT PRIMARY KEY, content_id INT, platform_id INT, post_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE content (id INT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(255), body TEXT);
CREATE TABLE accounts (id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(100), password VARCHAR(100));
